What I Do

My name is Khoi Nguyen, a passionate Vietnam & Canada based web application developer. I first discovered my interest in programming when I was in my mid-20s and I have worked towards improving my own skills, getting into industry and furthering my experience ever since. I specialize in developing website and mobile application.

React Development

I have a certain love for React as my main JavaScript frameworks to build powerful and organized front-end application.

NodeJS Development

Node is the main server-side language that I often use to build from simple to scalable application. Integrating with Express and MongoDB.

LAMP Stack

I also pay attention to the legacy stack of Web Development which is Laravel, Apache, MySQL and of course PHP.

Version Control

I ultilize Git as my main version control to work with GitHub repositories, GitHub Pages and Heroku.

CSS Frameworks

I focus to utilize Bootstrap as the main CSS frameworks to design the UI of the website. On top of that, I used Materialze UI, which I'm still learning it, for few projects of mine.

Mobile Development

In addition to Web Application Development, I also passionate about developing mobile app for both Android and iOS devices. If you ask which language I use, I would say React Native, which is to me a very powerful language to build cross-plaform mobile apps.
